wiktionary_senses.definition: A close embrace, especially when charged with an emotion such as affection, joy, relief, lust, anger, aggression, compassion, and the like, as opposed to being characterized by formality, equivocation or ambivalence (a half-embrace or "little hug").
To crouch; to huddle as with cold.
To embrace by holding closely, especially in the arms.
To hold fast; to cling to; to cherish.
